name: easy-sass-autocompile
description: Automatically compile your .sass and .scss fles on save. This extension supports sass and dart-sass and shipped with some inline features.

easySassAutocompile.sassBinLocation.markdownDescription: Insert the location of your Sass binary. The default location the extension will check  `/usr/local/lib/node_modules/dart-sass/sass.dart.js`. This is the default path of dart sass mac installation.

easySassAutocompile.sourceMap.markdownDescription: Automatically generate CSS source map link in `.css` and `.css.map` file.

easySassAutocompile.minify.markdownDescription: Automatically minifies the generated CSS in an additional `.min.css` file. Also compatible with source maps. All files will be generated in addition to the `.css` files.

easySassAutocompile.subFolder.markdownDescription: If you want to store your generated css files in a subfolder like `/dist`, it is also possible to use a relative filepath to maybe go to a higher folder level such as `../dist` or just go to the parent folder `../`.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
